entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Hunters Point
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
